snippet.title: Beat Hazard 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/618740/Beat_Hazard_2/

Beat Hazard 2 is a music driven twin stick shooter. You can play to any track you like and the game will react and create gameplay from that music.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Beat-Hazard-Ultra-163990450288224/ 
Twitter: @ColdBeamGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/coldbeamgamesltd/
Discord: https://discord.gg/beathazard

#indiegames #shootemup #musicgames
